column4: I was halfway installing ubuntu 8.10 and realised that the installor didnt prompt me to create a swap partition... Is swap partition no longer neccesary for ubuntu..
u cn create one even later
so the installer would not prompt you to setup a swap-partition...
so is the swap partition even important then..... I am 4Gb Ram..so I would need arnd 6 Gb Swap parition...
eqisow1 : Can I create the swap partition under the Extended Partition.... Currently, my extended partition, has 2 ntfs logical drives...
